text: Inene bona ndiya kubalahlekisa, yaye kananjalo ndiya kubaphembelela iinkanuko zobuxoki; ndibayalele ukuba bacazulule iindlebe zezilwanyana (iinkomo, iigusha nezinye), kananjalo mna ndiya kubayalela ukuba bayitshintshe indalo eyadalwa nguAllâh. Ke kaloku lowo uzithabathela uShaytân ukuba abe ngumncedi wakhe endaweni ka-Allâh, lowo inene uselahlekweni ecace gca
